thread.title: Read Drake’s Text Messages to Chance the Rapper After Winning a Grammy
thread.title_full: Read Drake’s Text Messages to Chance the Rapper After Winning a Grammy

author: Seth Kelley
title: Read Drake’s Text Messages to Chance the Rapper After Winning a Grammy
text:
Drake has no problem with Chance the Rapper ’s Grammy win. 
The rapper from Chicago shared the all-caps reaction he received from Drake after winning his first-ever Grammy on Sunday. Chance was crowned champion of the best rap performance category for his song “No Problem” with Lil Wayne and 2 Chainz. Drake, who is currently on tour in the U.K., won best rap/sung performance and best rap song for “Hotline Bling.” 
“Congrats boi!” Drake wrote. “Well deserved. I am in Manchester having a drink for u broski.” 
In the photo, Chance has typed out in response, “Love you bro! I’m hearing amazing things about your tour.” 
Chance was notably nominated for seven Grammys , including best new artists, during the first year that the Recording Academy accepted submissions for streaming-only artists. His album “Coloring Book” was a digital-only release. 
View the texting conversation below: A photo posted by Chance The Rapper (@chancetherapper) on Feb 12, 2017 at 4:15pm PST Filed Under:
